      • implicitWait

        public boolean implicitWait(long seconds)
        Description copied from interface: IWaitElement
        Purpose: The Method would wait for a certain amount of time before throwing an exception that it cannot find the element on the page. We should note that implicit waits will be in place for the entire time the browser is open. This means that any search for elements on the page could take the time the implicit wait is set for.
        Specified by:
        implicitWait in interface IWaitElement
        Returns:
        Returns true if Successful or Returns false
